actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.
Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations, H. Rept. 94-47.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of certain budget authority (D75-82) relating to the Department of Defense-Civil, Department of the Army Corps of Engineers-Civil which is proposed by the President in his message of October 31, 1974, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of the House of Representatives to the deferral of budget authority (D75-82) relating to the Corps of Engineers Mississippi River Flood Control Project of the Department of Defense-Civil, Department of the Army-Corps of Engineers-Civil proposed by (the President in his message of October 31, 1974, transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act.)

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of certain budget authority (D75-82) relating to the Department of Defense-Civil, Department of the Army Corps of Engineers-Civil which is proposed by the President in his message of October 31, 1974, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
